stories.text:
Recently there has been news about advancements in solid state batteries, specifically for electric vehicles.[1][2] However I can't seem to figure out how they're made. Is it cost or are there specific manufacturing processes that only companies like Toyota and Nissan can do?

[1]https://www.theverge.com/2022/4/8/23017045/nissan-ev-solid-state-battery-yokohama-plant-2028 [2]https://www.caranddriver.com/news/a38711469/toyota-solid-state-batteries-2025/
stories.title: How are solid state batteries manufactured?

stories.text:
Anyone tried modifying the AST-tree of a compiler for a given program(s) in VR space?

Is this a viable method for remote office code reviews?

Example working concept [1] would be comparing "old" K&R C / C89 vs. port to "modern" C.

aka Virtual chalk board in VR 2 or 3D to support video conference.

Non-free software for non-vr space ast idea: http://www.semdesigns.com/Products/DMS/DMSToolkit.html

[1] "Old C code -- how to upgrade it?" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30957273#30962540
